website_summaries.verdict: Casual styling and earthy good looks are sure to make it your everyday watch. A good choice for men who like masculine but minimalist timepieces.
pros: Traditional face with Arabic numbers and hand-wound movement
Sleek stainless steel bezel and sturdy khaki canvas strap
Has a date window and sapphire crystal
cons: Green face may not appeal to all men
38-millimeter case is ideal for some but may be too small for others

customer_reviews.title: Incdedible Everyday Field Watch
customer_reviews.text: Easily my favorite field watch. Comes on a vintage-y NATO strap that I instantly replaced with one of my own choosing. The black dial lends itself to endless strap choices. I like the Barton Jetson NATOs as well as the AlphaShark line from BluShark straps. Mind that you don’t over-wind this timepiece as it does not have over-wind protection. Start slowing down at 30 winds or so from a dead stop and quit winding as soon as you feel resistance. After 24 hours, 17-20 winds will do it.
customer_reviews.author: chikinhammr

customer_reviews.title: Just the best watch under 400$
customer_reviews.text: I initially bought this to see if I could live with a manual-wind watch before committing to a Omega MOTFM. This is the most versatile and most accurate watch I have. How can you beat +1 sec after a month!!! Really, a Swiss watch that accurate for under 400 usd is a steal. If you don't like the vintage looking lume, don't bother about as it is way way less aggressive when you see it in the metal. Forget about your skx0xxj, this is THE best buy around!
customer_reviews.author: Benoit L.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent field watch!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent watch! Just the right size at 38mm. It's a very nice looking watch that I find myself wearing more and more. It's reasonably accurate, with the ETA2801 movement getting about 10s/day. It's nice and thin and takes any G10/NATO strap with ease. Looks good on a bund strap as well. I was hesitant about the "old radium" lume, but it is now one of my favorite features. It's not as pronounced as it as appears in the photos, much more subtle. I highly recommend this Hamilton for any collection.
customer_reviews.author: Archaeocat

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Watch
customer_reviews.text: My son who is a newfound mechanical watch collector is gonna be very pleased come Christmas!
customer_reviews.author: Rob in Mountains

customer_reviews.title: Very nice watch
customer_reviews.text: Very nice watch. I ware it everyday. Gets more comfortable with use. Watch is nicer looking than thought.
customer_reviews.author: gman

customer_reviews.title: Very legible and durable
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic watch. I like winding it and how legible it is.
customer_reviews.author: TommyG

customer_reviews.title: Crown was different
customer_reviews.text: Crown had a different "H" from the picture but I love it!
customer_reviews.author: DuneBugger23

customer_reviews.title: This watch will not disappoint. Service was excellent.
customer_reviews.text: I love the look, the robustness, and the history of the watch. My Hamilton khaki Field Mechanical is my edc Watch. It matches my personality. This is a beautiful quality watch.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Dennis

customer_reviews.title: Really Nice Watch
customer_reviews.text: The watch is really nice, good looking and I am glad to add it to my watch collection.
customer_reviews.author: J. Michael Reilly

customer_reviews.title: Incredibly well-made, reliable, and good looking!
customer_reviews.text: My parents bought the displayed black dial, mechanical watch back in 1953, to mark a religious occasion when I was 13. I'm now 79 and it still is ticking away faithfully. I can't say anything more favorable about this product -- it's simply as good as it can get. Don
customer_reviews.author: Donald D Schultz

customer_reviews.title: I am not a customer
customer_reviews.text: I know these are great watches because when I was in the service many many years ago, I had an Amy issued watch, which of course was made by Hamilton. I lost mine many years ago and I would love to own one again someday. It was close to something like this, MIL-W-46374.
customer_reviews.author: Keith Stoneberger

product_meta.title: Hamilton Khaki Field Mechanical watch H69429931 diameter 38 mm
product_meta.description:
Black dial enhanced by silver-tone hands. Silver-tone stainless steel case with a green textile band. Hand Wind movement. 50 meters / 165 feet water resistance. Fixed bezel.
